maqras.text: Alif-Lam-Mim
Ghulibati Ar-Rumu
Fi 'Adna Al-'Arđi Wa Hum Min Ba`di Ghalabihim Sayaghlibuna
Fi Biđ`i Sinina Lillahi Al-'Amru Min Qablu Wa Min Ba`du Wa Yawma'idhin Yafrahu Al-Mu'uminuna
Binasri Allahi Yansuru Man Yasha'u Wa Huwa Al-`Azizu Ar-Rahimu
Wa`da Allahi La Yukhlifu Allahu Wa`dahu Wa Lakinna 'Akthara An-Nasi La Ya`lamuna
Ya`lamuna Zahiraan Mina Al-Hayaati Ad-Dunya Wa Hum `Ani Al-'Akhirati Hum Ghafiluna
Awalam Yatafakkaru Fi 'Anfusihim Ma Khalaqa Allahu As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđa Wa Ma Baynahuma 'Illa Bil-Haqqi Wa 'Ajalin Musammaan Wa 'Inna Kathiraan Mina An-Nasi Biliqa'i Rabbihim Lakafiruna

Awalam Yasiru Fi Al-'Arđi Fayanzuru Kayfa Kana `Aqibatu Al-Ladhina Min Qablihim Kanu 'Ashadda Minhum Quwatan Wa 'Atharu Al-'Arđa Wa `Amaruha 'Akthara Mimma `Amaruha Wa Ja'at/hum Rusuluhum Bil-Bayyinati Fama Kana Allahu Liyazlimahum Wa Lakin Kanu 'Anfusahum Yazlimuna
Thumma Kana `Aqibata Al-Ladhina 'Asa'u As-Su'a 'An Kadhabu Bi'ayati Allahi Wa Kanu Biha Yastahzi'un
Allahu Yabda'u Al-Khalqa Thumma Yu`iduhu Thumma 'Ilayhi Turja`una
Wa Yawma Taqumu As-Sa`atu Yublisu Al-Mujrimuna
Wa Lam Yakun Lahum Min Shuraka'ihim Shufa`a'u Wa Kanu Bishuraka'ihim Kafirina
Wa Yawma Taqumu As-Sa`atu Yawma'idhin Yatafarraquna
Fa'amma Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa `Amilu As-Salihati Fahum Fi Rawđatin Yuhbaruna
Wa 'Amma Al-Ladhina Kafaru Wa Kadhabu Bi'ayatina Wa Liqa'i Al-'Akhirati Fa'ula'ika Fi Al-`Adhabi Muhđaruna
Fasubhana Allahi Hina Tumsuna Wa Hina Tusbihuna
Wa Lahu Al-Hamdu Fi As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi Wa `Ashiyaan Wa Hina Tuzhiruna
Yukhriju Al-Hayya Mina Al-Mayyiti Wa Yukhriju Al-Mayyita Mina Al-Hayyi Wa Yuhyi Al-'Arđa Ba`da Mawtiha Wa Kadhalika Tukhrajuna
Wa Min 'Ayatihi 'An Khalaqakum Min Turabin Thumma 'Idha 'Antum Basharun Tantashiruna
Wa Min 'Ayatihi 'An Khalaqa Lakum Min 'Anfusikum 'Azwajaan Litaskunu 'Ilayha Wa Ja`ala Baynakum Mawaddatan Wa Rahmatan 'Inna Fi Dhalika La'ayatin Liqawmin Yatafakkaruna
Wa Min 'Ayatihi Khalqu As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi Wa Akhtilafu 'Alsinatikum Wa 'Alwanikum 'Inna Fi Dhalika La'ayatin Lil`alimina
Wa Min 'Ayatihi Manamukum Bil-Layli Wa An-Nahari Wa Abtigha'uukum Min Fađlihi 'Inna Fi Dhalika La'ayatin Liqawmin Yasma`una
Wa Min 'Ayatihi Yurikumu Al-Barqa Khawfaan Wa Tama`aan Wa Yunazzilu Mina As-Sama'i Ma'an Fayuhyi Bihi Al-'Arđa Ba`da Mawtiha 'Inna Fi Dhalika La'ayatin Liqawmin Ya`qiluna
Wa Min 'Ayatihi 'An Taquma As-Sama'u Wa Al-'Arđu Bi'amrihi Thumma 'Idha Da`akum Da`watan Mina Al-'Arđi 'Idha 'Antum Takhrujuna
Wa Lahu Man Fi As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi Kullun Lahu Qanituna
Wa Huwa Al-Ladhi Yabda'u Al-Khalqa Thumma Yu`iduhu Wa Huwa 'Ahwanu `Alayhi Wa Lahu Al-Mathalu Al-'A`la Fi As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi Wa Huwa Al-`Azizu Al-Hakimu

Đaraba Lakum Mathalaan Min 'Anfusikum Hal Lakum Min Ma Malakat 'Aymanukum Min Shuraka'a Fi Ma Razaqnakum Fa'antum Fihi Sawa'un Takhafunahum Kakhifatikum 'Anfusakum Kadhalika Nufassilu Al-'Ayati Liqawmin Ya`qiluna
Bal Attaba`a Al-Ladhina Zalamu 'Ahwa'ahum Bighayri `Ilmin Faman Yahdi Man 'Ađalla Allahu Wa Ma Lahum Min Nasirina
Fa'aqim Wajhaka Lilddini Hanifaan Fitrata Allahi Allati Fatara An-Nasa `Alayha La Tabdila Likhalqi Allahi Dhalika Ad-Dinu Al-Qayyimu Wa Lakinna 'Akthara An-Nasi La Ya`lamuna
